assignments.value: Staffing Agency

assignments.name: use_case_details
assignments.value: =The use case that I'd like to emphasize for this landing page is around timesheet collection / approval, invoice generation, and payroll automation as an automated workflow end to end to reduce timesheet, invoicing, and payroll by over 80%.

assignments.name: company_overview_prompt
assignments.value:
Workflowsy is a consulting service specialized in automating recurring business tasks to help business owners focus on their core operations. Our goal is to eliminate the tasks you dread, freeing up time for what you actually enjoy—running your business.|

Workflowsy is not intended to:
- Automate people out of a job
- Automate all aspects of a business
- Remove the 'human' aspect of a business

Our Guiding Principles:

1. Produces Business Value: Our approach centers around understanding you and your business to implement automations that provide actual value.
2. Sustainable For The Business: We prefer no-code and low-code tools like Make.com and Zapier because they are accessible for our clients to maintain and adapt over time.
3. Scales With You: Our automations are designed to scale with your business, enhancing output, quality, and workplace satisfaction, without replacing human jobs.

How We Work:
- No-Code: Simple, drag-and-drop tools intended for non-technical users. Ideal for initial forays into automation.  
Tools: Make.com, Zapier, Microsoft Power Automate

- Low-Code: For clients with some technical expertise, providing a bit more flexibility.  
Tools: No-Code Tools + Programming Languages like Python, Javascript

- Code: For the most demanding and bespoke automations requiring programming knowledge.  
Tools: Programming Languages like Python, Javascript

parameters.text:
=You are a landing page writing assistant that has been tasked with generating components of a landing page that will be combined together to build landing pages very quickly.

For background, the this is the company you're building landing pages for.

{{ $('Background Information').item.json.company_overview_prompt }}

Workflowsy has bought a bunch of domains in the automation space (automationforstaffing.com, automationforecommerce.com, etc.) that they would like to stand up individual websites on have really target uses cases on that are specific to a given industry / profession.

You will be provided with a section that needs to be generated an instructions to guide the overall generation.

Add in </br> between new lines in your outputs.

assignments.name: hero_header_title_prompt
assignments.value:
=I need to create a title for the hero section of my landing page. The landing page is for a domain called {{ $json.site_title }} with a domain {{ $json.domain }} of that is intended to serve as a page dedicated to an offer(s) around automation services for a {{ $json.target_company_type }}. Below is guidance for a how to create a great header for the landing page.

1/ Explain what you do

When your product is unique all you have to do is explain what you do as simply as possible.

2/ Hooks

Most products aren't unique. So a hook adds oomph. The easiest way to write hooks is to address your customer's biggest objection.

3/ Own your niche

Some startups transcend hooks. Another pattern is to own your niche in one line. Write with conviction. You're THE solution.

The title should be no more than 10 words long.

Integrate the title to algin with the use case provided here: {{ $json.use_case_details }}

assignments.name: hero_subtitle_prompt
assignments.value:
=We now need to create a subtitle for the landing page. Here is some guidance for how to best create subtitles for this landing page.

Subtitles are where you get specific. Introduce the product. Explain how it creates the value in your title.

Ex. Privy's conversion, email marketing, and text message tools (this is the introduction), help you get more customers from your traffic (this is the value)

Integrate the title to algin with the use case provided here: {{ $json.use_case_details }}

assignments.name: hero_call_to_action
assignments.value: =The call to action should be 3-5 words tops encouraging the potential prospect to reach out / start automating / etc whatever is relevant to the offer.

assignments.name: =industry_painpoints_header
industry_painpoints
assignments.value: =Describe the top 3-5 pain points faced by businesses in the {{ $json.target_company_type }} industry. Each pain point should be described in a way that resonates with decision-makers, highlighting the impact on efficiency, costs, and business growth. Make sure to articulate the pain points in a way that emphasizes the need for automation solutions. If it makes sense, integrate the title to align with the use case provided here: {{ $json.use_case_details }} The response must be an array of bullet points. The content section of the response should resemble this structure: [ "{painpoint high level}: {painpoint description}", "{painpoint high level}: {painpoint description}", "{painpoint high level}: {painpoint description}", "{painpoint high level}: {painpoint description}", "{painpoint high level}: {painpoint description}", ] The step number and step should all be one string, not separated by a colon. Ensure that the response is valid JSON and the array elements are strings properly formatted for JSON.

assignments.name: industry_painpoints_blurb
assignments.value:
=Write a concise paragraph that summarizes the key pain points in {{ $json.target_company_type }} companies and positions our automation consultancy as the perfect solution to these challenges. The paragraph should be engaging, build credibility, and include a call to action encouraging the visitor to learn more or get in touch.

If it makes sense, integrate the title to algin with the use case provided here: {{ $json.use_case_details }}

assignments.name: automation_speaks_for_itself_header
assignments.value:
=Generate a compelling header for a landing page section that introduces the effectiveness of automation solutions and highlights how they directly demonstrate their value in {{ $json.target_company_type }} companies. The header should be concise, impactful, and convey a sense of confidence and proof in the automation’s capabilities.

If it makes sense, integrate the title to algin with the use case provided here: {{ $json.use_case_details }}

assignments.name: automation_speaks_for_itself_blurb
how_it_works_header
assignments.value:
=Generate a clear and engaging title for a 'How It Works' section on a landing page that explains the process of implementing automation solutions for a {{ $json.target_company_type }}. The title should be concise, inviting, and convey that the steps are simple and effective.

If it makes sense, integrate the title to algin with the use case provided here: {{ $json.use_case_details }}

assignments.name: how_it_works_paragraph
assignments.value:
=Write a brief description for a 'How It Works' section on a landing page that explains the process of implementing automation solutions for businesses in a {{ $json.target_company_type }}. The description should be concise, clear, and reassuring, emphasizing ease of use, effectiveness, and minimal disruption to current operations. Do not list out steps in this description.


If it makes sense, integrate the title to algin with the use case provided here: {{ $json.use_case_details }}

assignments.name: how_it_works_steps
assignments.value: =Outline a step-by-step process for how the automation solution is implemented in a {{ $json.target_company_type }}. Each step should be clearly defined, easy to understand, and highlight the key actions taken by both the consultancy and the client. Include any relevant details that demonstrate the thoroughness and effectiveness of the process. Limit this to 6 steps max. If it makes sense, integrate the title to algin with the use case provided here: {{ $json.use_case_details }} The content section of the response should resemble this structure. [ "Step Number and high level description: {step}", "Step Number and high level description: {step}", "Step Number and high level description: {step}", "Step Number and high level description: {step}", "Step Number and high level description: {step}" ], The step number and step should all be one string, not separated by a colon. Ensure that the response is valid JSON. Do not include new line characters but rather rely on json for proper formatting.
